# adaR

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of adaR is to capture, document and automate ADA curation processes. This package is a work in process. Please contact Lawrence Rogers for more info.

## Installation

You can install the development version from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("lawrencehr/adaR")
```
## Example

This is a basic example which shows you how to solve a common problem:

```{r example}
library(adaR)
## basic example code
```
